name: Colorbot
overview: Colorbot (also known as Robotattack) is a game similar in some ways to Robotron: 2084, but using only one joystick. This was developed by Kevin Martin in 1983 and published in the following: • North America: COMPUTE! 1984/01 (Issue #44) • Italy: Super VIC & C64 A1-N2 (July/August 1984) • Courbois Software also released a Dutch language version as well. Only the Dutch conversion has a title screen. A version for the VIC-20 was also available in the same issue of COMPUTE!
